name: @indeks/shared
description: Shared types, constants, and utilities for Indeks SDK

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target browser
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node
